AT.name: Harvest Moon: Dorf des Himmelsbaumes
AT.description: In dem Land, das die Oase der Erntegöttin genannt wird, haben die Zeiten sich geändert. Früher lebten viele Menschen im Himmelsbaumdorf und das Land war fruchtbar und grün. Doch die Macht der Erntegöttin schwand mit der Zeit ... und das Land wurde zu einer trockenen Einöde. Nur du kannst dabei helfen, die sieben Himmelsbäume wiederzubeleben, um die Macht der Erntegöttin wiederherzustellen und der Steppe neues Leben einzuhauchen! Erkunde das Himmelsbaumdorf, schließe neue Freundschaften und wende dich dann dem Land zu – gestalte es ganz nach deinen Wünschen, bestelle deine Felder, züchte Tiere und genieße das Leben in vollen Zügen! • Das neuste Spiel aus der Reihe Harvest Moon bietet viele Verbesserungen, die von den Fans angeregt wurden: detaillierte Anleitungen, eine optimierte Steuerung, bessere Werkzeuge und vieles mehr! • Spiele als Junge oder Mädchen und erkunde ein ganzes Dorf voller neuer Bewohner, mit denen du Freundschaft schließen kannst. Jeder von ihnen ist auf seine eigene Art liebenswürdig. • Gestalte und bestelle das Land ganz nach deinem Wunsch, entdecke neue Nutzpflanzen und Blumen, erschließe Wasserwege und fange neue und seltene Fische. • Kümmere dich um das neuste Tier in der Reihe Harvest Moon: den Poitou-Esel!

AU.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
AU.description: Times have changed in the Oasis of the Harvest Goddess. Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green. However, the power of the Harvest Goddess gradually began to wane, and the land became parched and dry… that is, until you arrived! Only you can help to revive the seven Skytrees in order to give the Harvest Goddess her power back and, in turn, return life to this desolate land! Explore Skytree Village and make new friends, then turn your hand to the soil and shape the land however you like to grow crops, raise livestock and live life to the fullest! • The latest game in the Harvest Moon series, with many gameplay refinements based on fan feedback: detailed tutorials, improved controls, upgraded tools and much more! • Play as a boy or girl, then explore a full town with new residents and friends to make, each with their own personalities and quirks. • Mould and shape the land any way you like, discover new crops and flowers, expand waterways and catch new and rare fish. • Care for the newest animal addition to the Harvest Moon series: the Poitou donkey!

BG.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
BG.description: Times have changed in the Oasis of the Harvest Goddess. Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green. BE.name: Harvest Moon: Le village de l'arbre céleste
BE.description: Les temps ont changé dans la région connue sous le nom d'Oasis de la Déesse des récoltes. Le Village de l'Arbre céleste comptait de nombreux habitants, et la contrée était verte et luxuriante. Mais le pouvoir de la Déesse des récoltes a dépéri, et les terres se sont desséchées... jusqu'à votre arrivée ! Vous seul pouvez redonner vie aux sept Arbres célestes et rendre son pouvoir à la Déesse des récoltes afin de ramener à la vie cette terre désolée ! Explorez le Village de l'Arbre céleste et faites-vous de nouveaux amis puis attelez-vous à la tâche en faisant pousser des récoltes, en élevant du bétail et en profitant au maximum de la vie ! • Le dernier jeu de la série des Harvest Moon, avec de nombreuses retouches à la jouabilité suite aux retours des fans : des didacticiels détaillés, des commandes améliorées, des outils plus efficaces, etc. ! • Incarnez un garçon ou une fille et explorez un bourg entier pour se faire des amis et découvrir de nouveaux habitants, chacun possédant sa personnalité et ses excentricités. • Travaillez la terre comme vous le désirez, découvrez de nouveaux plants et fleurs, agrandissez le réseau d'arrosage et attrapez des poissons rares et inédits. • Occupez-vous du dernier animal ajouté à la série des Harvest Moon : l'âne du Poitou !

ES.name: Harvest Moon: El Pueblo del Árbol Celeste
ES.description: Los tiempos han cambiado en el oasis de la Diosa de la Cosecha. Mucha gente solía vivir en el Pueblo del Árbol Celeste, y la tierra era exuberante y verde. Pero el poder de la Diosa de la Cosecha comenzó a apagarse poco a poco, y la tierra se acabó marchitando y secando... ¡hasta que llegaste tú! ¡Solo tú puedes ayudar a revivir los siete árboles del cielo para devolverle el poder a la Diosa de la Cosecha y, a su vez, restaurar la vida en esta tierra desolada! Explora el Pueblo del Árbol Celeste y haz nuevos amigos; atiende la tierra y dale forma al paisaje como más te guste cultivando, criando ganado ¡y viviendo la vida al máximo! • El último juego de la saga Harvest Moon trae numerosos ajustes de jugabilidad basados ​​en los comentarios de los fans: tutoriales detallados, controles mejorados, herramientas actualizadas ¡y mucho más! • Juega como chico o chica y explora un pueblo entero con nuevos residentes y amigos por conocer, cada uno con sus propias personalidades y excentricidades. • Moldea y da forma a la tierra a tu antojo, descubre nuevos cultivos y flores, amplía canales y captura peces nuevos y raros. • Cuida de la última incorporación animal a la saga Harvest Moon: ¡el burro Poitou!

IT.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
IT.description: I tempi sono cambiati nell’Oasi della Dea del raccolto. Il villaggio Skytree brulicava di vita e la sua terra era verde e lussureggiante. Tuttavia, il potere della Dea del raccolto iniziò pian piano ad affievolirsi, la terra divenne arida e secca... Per lo meno fino al tuo arrivo! Solo tu puoi aiutarci a far rivivere i sette Skytree, per restituire alla Dea del raccolto il suo potere e in cambio riportare la vita in queste lande desolate! Esplora il villaggio Skytree e stringi nuove amicizie, poi lavora la terra per darle forma nel modo che preferisci, pianta colture, alleva il bestiame e vivi una vita bucolica! • L’ultimo gioco della serie Harvest Moon, con molti perfezionamenti introdotti in seguito al feedback ricevuto dai fan: tutorial dettagliati, comandi migliorati, strumenti potenziati e molto altro! • Gioca nei panni di un ragazzo o di una ragazza, esplora un intero villaggio con nuovi abitanti che potranno diventare tuoi amici; ognuno con una personalità e caratteristiche definite. • Modella e dai forma al terreno come preferisci, scopri nuove piante e fiori, espandi la rete idrica e pesca nuovi pesci rari. • Occupati del nuovissimo animale aggiunto alla serie Harvest Moon: l’asino di Poitou!

NL.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
NL.description: De tijden zijn veranderd in de oase van de Harvest Goddess. Vroeger woonden er veel mensen in Skytree Village en was het land weelderig groen. Maar de kracht van de Harvest Goddess nam geleidelijk af en het land werd dor en droog... totdat jij verscheen! Alleen jij kunt de zeven Skytrees weer tot leven wekken om de Harvest Goddess haar kracht terug te geven en dit verlaten land weer bruisend en levendig te maken! Verken Skytree Village en maak nieuwe vrienden. Neem daarna de aarde onder handen en vorm het land zoals jij het wilt: kweek gewassen, verzorg dieren en haal alles uit het leven! • Het nieuwste spel in de Harvest Moon-serie bevat veel verfijningen op basis van feedback van fans: gedetailleerde tutorials, verbeterde besturing en gereedschap en nog veel meer! • Speel als meisje of jongen en verken een hele stad vol nieuwe inwoners en toekomstige vrienden, ieder met een eigen karakter en grappige trekjes. • Vorm het land zoals jij het wilt, ontdek nieuwe gewassen en bloemen, breid waterpartijen uit en vang nieuwe en zeldzame vissen. • Verzorg het nieuwste dier van de Harvest Moon-serie: de Poitou-ezel!

NZ.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
NZ.description: Times have changed in the Oasis of the Harvest Goddess. Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green. However, the power of the Harvest Goddess gradually began to wane, and the land became parched and dry… that is, until you arrived! Only you can help to revive the seven Skytrees in order to give the Harvest Goddess her power back and, in turn, return life to this desolate land! Explore Skytree Village and make new friends, then turn your hand to the soil and shape the land however you like to grow crops, raise livestock and live life to the fullest! • The latest game in the Harvest Moon series, with many gameplay refinements based on fan feedback: detailed tutorials, improved controls, upgraded tools and much more! • Play as a boy or girl, then explore a full town with new residents and friends to make, each with their own personalities and quirks. • Mould and shape the land any way you like, discover new crops and flowers, expand waterways and catch new and rare fish. • Care for the newest animal addition to the Harvest Moon series: the Poitou donkey!

PL.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
PL.description: Times have changed in the Oasis of the Harvest Goddess. Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green. However, the power of the Harvest Goddess gradually began to wane, and the land became parched and dry… that is, until you arrived! Only you can help to revive the seven Skytrees in order to give the Harvest Goddess her power back and, in turn, return life to this desolate land! Explore Skytree Village and make new friends, then turn your hand to the soil and shape the land however you like to grow crops, raise livestock and live life to the fullest! • The latest game in the Harvest Moon series, with many gameplay refinements based on fan feedback: detailed tutorials, improved controls, upgraded tools and much more! • Play as a boy or girl, then explore a full town with new residents and friends to make, each with their own personalities and quirks. • Mould and shape the land any way you like, discover new crops and flowers, expand waterways and catch new and rare fish. • Care for the newest animal addition to the Harvest Moon series: the Poitou donkey!

PT.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
PT.description: Os tempos mudaram no oásis da deusa da colheita. Muitas pessoas viviam na vila Skytree, a terra era rica e verdejante. Entretanto, o poder da deusa da colheita começou a diminuir lentamente, tornando a terra vazia e seca. Até o momento da sua chegada! Somente você consegue ajudar a reviver as sete Skytrees para trazer de volta o poder da deusa da colheita e devolver vida à terra desolada! Explore a vila Skytree e faça novos amigos, depois foque no solo e molde a terra como quiser para criar plantações, cuidar do gado e aproveitar a vida ao máximo! • O mais recente jogo da série Harvest Moon, com várias melhorias de jogabilidade baseadas nos comentários dos fãs: tutoriais detalhados, controles melhorados, ferramentas atualizadas e muito mais! • Jogue como um garoto ou uma garota e explore uma cidade completa com novos habitantes e amigos, cada um com sua própria personalidade • Molde a terra como quiser, descubra novas plantações e novas flores, amplie hidrovias e pesque novos peixes raros. • Cuide do mais novo animal da série Harvest Moon: o burro Poitou!

RU.name: Harvest Moon: Skytree Village
RU.description: Настали другие времена в Оазисе Богини урожая. Раньше в деревне Скайтри жило множество жителей, а здешние земли были покрыты буйной растительностью. Однако сила Богини урожая постепенно начала слабеть, и земля вся высохла и покрылась трещинами... но теперь у нас есть вы! Только вы можете возродить семь Скайтри, чтобы вернуть силу Богине урожая и восстановить былое великолепие этой пустынной земли! Исследуйте деревню Скайтри и найдите новых друзей, займитесь земледелием и решите, как вы хотите вырастить урожай и домашний скот, чтобы начать жить по-полной! • Новейшая игра из серии Harvest Moon со множеством игровых улучшений на основе пожеланий фанатов: теперь в игре предлагаются подробное обучение, усовершенствованные элементы управления, обновленные инструменты и многое другое! • Играйте за мальчика или девочку, исследуя город, знакомясь с новыми жителями и заводя друзей, каждый из которых отличается уникальных характером. • Меняйте и формируйте земли по своему вкусу, открывайте новые растения и цветы, расширяйте водные пути и ловите редкую рыбу. • Познакомьтесь с новым животным в серии игр Harvest Moon — осликом Пойту!

SE.description: Times have changed in the Oasis of the Harvest Goddess. Many people used to live in Skytree Village, and the land was lush and green.
